mapper.insert: merge user_info t using (select #{userno} as userno , 'IN' as usertype , #{username} as username , #{name} as name , #{password} as password , #{email} as email , #{deptcd} as deptcd , #{poscd} as poscd , #{tel} as tel , #{addr} as addr , #{addrdtl} as addrdtl , 'Y' as useflag , 'KO' as langcd , #{sid} as regcd , getdate() as regdt , #{sid} as modcd , getdate() as moddt ) s on t.userno = s.userno and t.username = s.username when matched then update set usertype = s.usertype , name = s.name , password = s.password , email = s.email , deptcd = s.deptcd , poscd = s.poscd , tel = s.tel , addr = s.addr , addrdtl = s.addrdtl , useflag = s.useflag , langcd = s.langcd , modcd = s.modcd , moddt = s.moddt when not matched then insert ( userno , usertype , username , name , password , email , deptcd , poscd , tel , addr , addrdtl , useflag , langcd , regcd , regdt ) values ( s.userno , s.usertype , s.username , s.name , s.password , s.email , s.deptcd , s.poscd , s.tel , s.addr , s.addrdtl , s.useflag , s.langcd , s.regcd , s.regdt );
